#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string.h>
#define ll int
using namespace std;
int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	ll col,row,i,len,j,u;
	while(1)
	{
		cin>>col;
		if(col==0)
			break;
		else
		{
			string st;
			cin>>st;
			len=st.length();
			char str[len];
			row=(int)len/col;
			char str1[row][col];
			strcpy(str, st.c_str());
			u=0;
			for (i=0;i<row;i++)//rows
			{
				if(i%2)
       		    {
        	        for(j=col-1;j>=0;j--)
        	           str1[i][j]=str[u++];
        	    }
            	else
            	{
        		    for(j=0;j<col;j++)
            		{
            		    str1[i][j]=str[u++];
            		}
            	}
			}
			for(i=0;i<col;i++)
			{
				for(j=0;j<row;j++)
					cout<<str1[j][i];
			}
			cout<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
